comments.body:
Bro,  I don't think you get it , getting a difficult shift is also better right?
Pessat is shift based , so if your shift is difficult, it will be difficult for everyone , and even for less number of correct answers you'll get a better rank.
For easy shifts there will be higher competition. 
In a sense it dosent even matter cause if you're well prepared you can write a shift of any difficulty.
"Luck" would be getting majority questions from the chapters you studied.
